name: All Bets Are Off
description:
Wanna test your luck in gambling?

Enter our grand casino and play against your opponents in a match of dice rolling!

You can win money WITHOUT betting away your hard earned (or nonexistent) money!

If you can win against your opponent, our staff will hand you cash from our own pockets! Yes, you heard that right! If you can win against your opponent, you get money from US!

Now, you may wonder, "What'll happen if I lose?". Honestly, this isn't anything to worry about! Losing against your opponent just means that you'll get a teensy-weensy bit of debt that you'll have to pay back before you can play again!

But let's not think of that any more than we have to! Come on over and have a jolly old time! You can think about your consequences later.

2D Programming: (itch.io) Jen Ha

Music: (itch.io) Jasmine Ha

2D Artist: (itch.io) (Instagram) Sandy Rao

Miscellaneous Sound Effects: Mixkit
